prolongations.prolongation_0: 例  added spices to the stew with complete abandon 肆无忌惮地向炖菜里面加调料
例  abandon oneself to emotion 感情用事,abandon herself to a life of complete idleness 放纵自己过着闲散的生活

explain.englishMeaning: to withdraw from often in the face of danger or encroachment

explain.englishMeaning: to put an end to (something planned or previously agreed to)
